detail_desc: Leather shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap with intertwined leather cord, a flap with two magnetic fasteners, a compartment and zipped inner pocket. Lined. Size 11x10.5x27 cm.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem.
Sunglasses with metal and glittery plastic frames, and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt, a fake fly with visible, decorative buttons, patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back, short, narrow shoulder straps and short slits in the sides.
Top in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, frill trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Lined.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Ankle-length boiler suit in a soft viscose weave with a round neck, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back, and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button. Small chest pocket, patch front pockets, a seam with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and wide, gently tapered legs.
Sun hat in woven fabric with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Chino shorts in soft, stretch cotton twill with diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Maxi dress in crinkled chiffon and recycled polyester with a deep V-neck at the front and a halterneck that fastens with long, wide ties at the back. Concealed zip in one side, asymmetric seams at the waist and a wide, heavily draping voluminous skirt. The skirt has vertical flounces for width and movement, a high slit at the front and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and gathers at the top. Loose fit with a rounded hem.
Straight-cut coat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.

Longer-style hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bralette in lace and mesh with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length trousers in jersey. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a jacquard knit. Fleece-lined hat with a pompom on top, ear flaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight, knee-length legs.

Ski trousers in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a fly with a concealed zip and button. Detachable, adjustable braces with a hook and loop fastener. Elastication at the back of the trousers. Snow flaps and reflective hook and loop strips at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in cotton denim with frayed details. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a cut-off hem.
Lace blouse woven in a cotton blend with a round neck, an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs. Partly lined.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Single-breasted jacket in an Oxford cotton weave with a chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit with an opening for the heels. The polyester content of the leg warmers is recycled.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.

Long, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that meet at the back. Narrow elasticated seam under the bust and flounces down the skirt for added width. Lined down to the hips.
Short A-line skirt in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch front pockets. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Rib-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a straight hem.

Slightly shorter, gently fitted jacket in a textured bouclé weave made from a wool blend with contrasting colour details. Fastening with metal buttons at the front and front pockets with a decorative button. Satin lining.
Jacket in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with notch lapels and a covered button at the front. Welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves with elastication around the top and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Platform trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Fluted soles.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front, a glittery peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads and pendants in different lengths of metal chain. Length 10.5 cm.

Soft shell trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with elastic at the back of the waist and a zip fly with press-studs. Extended waistband with a hook-and-loop fastening, zipped side pockets and reinforced hems. Slim fit with flared legs.

Short jacket in imitation suede with a faux fur lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and adjustable tabs in imitation leather with metal buckles at the cuffs and hem. Faux fur lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with decorative buttons at the top. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.

Flared dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and a skirt in broderie anglaise, buttons down the back and a seam at the waist. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Skinny-fit trousers in washed superstretch twill with hard-worn details. Front and back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin tights with a glittery pattern and an elasticated waist.
Coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere with narrow notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals with an elastic ankle strap and rubber soles.
Swimsuit with a print motif and narrow shoulder straps. Lined at the front and crotch.

Slim-fit jeans in soft superstretch denim with worn and embroidered details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Dress in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a button, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Trousers in stretch imitation leather with a high waist, press-stud fly, zipped front pockets and slim legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide, V-neck blouse in soft cotton flannel with a collar, pleats at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
